version_description:
- iOS9 sensor connectivity issues fixed.
- General improvements.

- iOS9 sensor connectivity issues fixed.
- General improvements.

- New activity types: Indoor cycling, Snowshoeing, Jet Skiing and Powerboating.
- General improvements.

- New activity types: Indoor cycling, Snowshoeing, Jet Skiing and Powerboating.
- General improvements.
General improvements and optimisations
General improvements and optimisations
General improvements and optimisations
General improvements and optimisations

ACTIVITY MAPS - the all-new activity, friends and profile maps let you follow the progress of people or groups live. It’s a great new way to find, or follow friends while you are out yourself.

LEADERBOARDS - the all-new leaderboard lets you compare your performance with friends, others near you or anyone else on Map My Tracks. Leaderboards showcase your distance versus others across any activity type each week and month.

We love to hear your feedback. Get in touch through the Support forum online to tell us how you get on with the new features or if you experience any issues.

v4.6
- All new download option to recover your synced activities. It's a great way to get all your activities back onto your device from Map My Tracks.
- Friends has been renamed Activity Feed and now includes a list of your own public activities.
- Various other improvements

This update celebrates our 1 million users on Map My Tracks. It's a bumper update packed with loads of new features including:

Profile Insights - provides a detailed breakdown of your performance for the past 4 weeks, year and all-time.
Profile Photos - showcases all your photos pinned to activities.
Activity Photos - features all the photos pinned to an individual activity.
Activity Segments - shows you all the segments you covered in by a session.
Segment leaderboard - highlights the personal best times for everyone that has covered a particular segment.
Discover Friends - makes it easy to find friends on Map My Tracks.

There are many more improvements dotted around the app which we hope you enjoy.

We have supercharged the app with an all-new event section that lets you find, follow and attend events. 

Map My Tracks Events are great for sports clubs and event organisers. They showcase event routes, participants and all the latest news.

As ever, if you enjoy using the app please take a moment to post a review.

This update includes:
- GPS improvements for slow moving activities like walking or hiking.
- Updated dashboard layout to make it easier to start an activity or to access your activity feed.
- General improvements around the app.

In the previous update:
- We supercharged the app with an all-new event section that lets you find, follow and attend events. 

As ever, if you enjoy using the app please take a moment to post a review. 

If you have any issues with the app, or just want to say hello, then get in touch by email support@mapmytracks.com.

This update adds some neat new features including:

Audio alerts for each mile or kilometre completed. Go to Settings > Notifications to activate this feature.

New cycling map style. Go to Settings > Maps to set this as your default or simply toggle through the map styles while tracking.

Photo thumbnails now appear in the activity feed. If someone has pinned a photo to their activity a thumbnail now shows the first one.

Photos with GPS data now appear on the activity replay map so you can see where they were taken.

We've also taken a moment to include various other improvements around the app.

If you enjoy using the app please take a moment to post a review in the App Store. Your feedback and reviews really do help.

If you require any assistance with the new features then get in touch - support@mapmytracks.com.

OSM Outdoor Maps - A detailed walking and hiking map type is now available to set as your default map type, or toggle through while tracking.

Various other improvements around the app.

If you enjoy using the app please take a moment to post a review in the App Store. Your feedback and reviews really do help.

If you require any assistance with the new features then get in touch - support@mapmytracks.com.

Map My Tracks Moments - Create beautifully crafted personalized videos of your outdoor adventures with Map My Tracks Moments to download or share online.

Photos, speed, heart rate, power and cadence as well as your highest elevation are all highlighted and included in your personalized video.

Tap on the play icon under any activity to create your own Moments video to share.

Map My Tracks Moments - Create beautifully crafted personalized videos of your outdoor adventures with Map My Tracks Moments to download or share online.

Photos, speed, heart rate, power and cadence as well as your highest elevation are all highlighted and included in your personalized video.

Tap on the play icon under any activity to create your own Moments video to share.

If you love Map My Tracks, help spread the word by leaving a review. 

►► v4.12 

Taking photos, and uploading them, just got a whole lot easier. This update lets you take photos directly within the app and upload them to your Map My Tracks profile. 

When tracking live photos can be synced online for others to see immediately. Alternatively, photos can be uploaded to activities when you get back home - all from within the app.

Tap on the Camera icon when tracking to get started.

We hope you like the updates.

If you love Map My Tracks, help spread the word by leaving a review.

We hope you like the updates.

Who doesn't love a goal? Set yourself a goal to help keep yourself on track.

We've supercharged the social gallery to now show multiple photos in a slide format. Swipe left to see more photos.

- Dashboard now includes a breakdown of distance, speed, calories, pace, speed for each time period.
- Mile or kilometer splits for each activity

>> Dashboard
The dashboard now lets you toggle between speed, pace, calories, and more, for each time period. It'll tell you if you're up on the same period as before, or down as the case may be.

>> Splits
Every activity now has a breakdown of each mile or kilometre split with elevation differences and average heart rate. Tap on the speed display to view the splits.

- Dashboard now includes a breakdown of distance, speed, calories, pace, speed for each time period.
- Mile or kilometer splits for each activity

- All-new clear, crisp maps.
- iPhone X screen compatible.
- General improvements and fixes.

>> Maps
The mapping engine has been rebuilt from the ground up to provide clearer, high-definition maps. 

>> iPhone X
The app is now compatible with iPhone X screens that maximizes the screen space.

>> General improvements
Also included in this update are home screen actions and a range of performance and stability improvements.

Improvements include:
- Added two new activity types, Hand cycling and Wheelchair.
- Improved loading speed of activities from public profile.
- Added all new section in Setting to manage the notifications you receive.
- Added new social galleries for places and countries.
- Bluetooth devices are now easier to manage.

Fixes include:
- App no longer crashes when you take a photo. Sorry.
- Calorie count on dashboard is now correct.

This update includes various improvements to make it easier to see all the details when using the app in bright light. Various design changes make the details clearer and easier to read.

We've also updated the dashboard menu to bring together all the useful tools in one place. Check out the options in the More tab on the dashboard to view your heat map, set goals and browse your photos.

This update includes various improvements to make it easier to see all the details when using the app in bright light. Various design changes make the details clearer and easier to read.

We've also updated the dashboard menu to bring together all the useful tools in one place. Check out the options in the More tab on the dashboard to view your heat map, set goals and browse your photos.

Pin more photos, faster, to your activities. Now you can select up to ten photos at a time to upload to your activities to tell the whole story.

We've also taken some time to fix a few things that weren't quite right. 

Enjoy the update.

This update improves the loading speed of various pages. It's a small update but one that we hope you like.
This update improves the loading speed of various pages. It's a small update but one that we hope you like.

It's easier than ever to upload photos to your adventures to tell the whole story.

Now, if you've taken photos during your activity you can pin them right after finishing. As before, you can still add photos at any time.

If you have any feedback on this new feature or any others please do get in touch through our support channel.

Small update to better load some maps after stopping an activity.

It's now easier to see other friends tracking live while you're out yourself. Tap on the pin man icon from the tracking page to see who's out nearby while you are.

Various other improvements make this a small but handy update which we hope you enjoy. 

Let us know what you think with a review in the App Store or get in touch with the team at HQ by email: support@mapmytracks.com

This update introduces a 30 day free trial to Map My Tracks PLUS. Simply tap through to upgrade and if haven't previously been a subscriber then you can upgrade to PLUS free for 30 days to try out all the features.

We've also taken a moment to tidy some features and moved some map styles into PLUS.

If you have any questions about the changes then get in touch at support@mapmytracks.com.

This update introduces a 30 day free trial to Map My Tracks PLUS. Simply tap through to upgrade and if haven't previously been a subscriber then you can upgrade to PLUS free for 30 days to try out all the features.

We've also taken a moment to tidy some features and moved some map styles into PLUS.

If you have any questions about the changes then get in touch at support@mapmytracks.com.

We've taken a moment to add in some small improvements and fix a few issues that have crept in. 

The changes in this update include:
- Audio works seamlessly with any other music that might be playing.
- Your personalised email address has been added to Settings.
- Inline Skating has been added an activity.
- Various improvements and fixes.

We've taken a moment to add in some small improvements and fix a few issues that have been reported to us. Your feedback is always thankfully received. Keep it up. 

In this update we have:
- Added an option in Settings to change the language the app uses. 
- Improved how you can share your activities on Facebook and Twitter.
- Add in some guidance on how to improve the accuracy of GPS tracks.

Notes can be added once again!
Notes can be added once again!

This is a bumper update with great new features including:

• Collections: Bundle your activities into a collection to keep them organised and easy to find. 

• Add manual activities: If you've ever forgotten to start tracking your progress then you can now add a manual activity and make sure every one counts. 

• Faster app: We've made the app launch faster so you can get going even quicker.

• Refinements: As well as all the above we've made various improvements around the app. 

We hope you enjoy the new features.

This is a bumper update with great new features including:

• Collections: Bundle your activities into a collection to keep them organised and easy to find. 

• Add manual activities: If you've ever forgotten to start tracking your progress then you can now add a manual activity and make sure every one counts. 

• Faster app: We've made the app launch faster so you can get going even quicker.

• Refinements: As well as all the above we've made various improvements around the app. 

We hope you enjoy the new features.
